Description: Bank Albilad (known as: ALBILAD) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since April 2005. It operates within the Banks sector focusing on Diversified Banks. It has companies operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Investment Banking and Brokerage and Diversified Real Estate Activities. ALBILAD is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in November 2004.
